primaryData.name: BrocareLs+
primaryData.composition: Ambroxol hydrochloride, levosalbutamol, and guaiphenesin syrup

sections.title: Description
sections.content: Ambroxol hydrochloride, levosalbutamol, and guaiphenesin syrup is a combination of three medicines that treat coughs.

sections.title: Composition
sections.content: Each hard gelatin Capsule contains: Rabeprazole Sodium (As enteric coated pellets) I.P. 20 mg, Levosulpiride (As sustained release pellets) 75 mg, Excipients q.s., Approved colour used in empty capsule shells.

sections.title: Dosage
sections.content: As directed by the physician.

sections.title: Storage
sections.content: Store in a cool, dry & dark place. Protect from direct sunlight. Keep medicine out of reach of children. Do not chew or crush the capsule. It should be swallowed whole.

sections.title: Manufacturer
sections.content: Manufactured By: Saphnix Life Sciences (A WHO-GMP Certified Company) Village-Barotiwala, Paonta Sahib, Distt. Sirmour, Himachal Pradesh-173 025. Mfg. Lic. No.: MNB/08/680 & MB/08/681

sections.title: Batch Information
sections.content: Batch No.: HC4770O, Manufacturing Date: 08/2023, Expiry Date: 07/2025

sections.title: Prescription Warning
sections.content: SCHEDULE H PRESCRIPTION DRUG - CAUTION: Not to be sold by retail without the prescription of a Registered Medical Practitioner.

sections.title: Marketing
sections.content: Marketed By: Caremark Pharmaceutical Mantra City, Ranipur Range, Haridwar, Uttrakhand, Pin-249403

products.name: SmraFlam
products.composition: Aceclofenac IP 50 mg, Paracetamol IP 125 mg

sections.title: Description
sections.content: SmraFlam Suspension - Shake well before each use.

sections.title: Composition
sections.content: Each 5 ml contains: Aceclofenac IP 50 mg, Paracetamol IP 125 mg, in flavoured suspension base q.s. Colour: Sunset Yellow.

sections.title: Dosage
sections.content: As directed by the Physician.

sections.title: Storage
sections.content: Store in a cool & dark place. Protect from direct sunlight, heat & moisture. Temp. below 25° C. Keep the medicine out of the reach of children.

sections.title: Warnings
sections.content: Taking more than the daily dose of Paracetamol may cause serious liver damage or allergic reactions (e.g., swelling of the face, mouth and throat, difficulty in breathing, itching or rash). To be sold by retail on the prescription of a Registered Medical Practitioner only.

sections.title: Manufacturer
sections.content: Manufactured By: Algen Healthcare Limited (A G.M.P. Certified Company) 134/2, Vill. Khara Khari, Sadhaura Road, Kala Amb, Distt. Sirmour (H.P.) 173030.

sections.title: Batch Information
sections.content: Batch No.: AHL-669, Manufacturing Date: 03/2023, Expiry Date: 02/2025.

sections.title: Marketing
sections.content: Marketed By: Caremark Pharmaceutical Pvt. Ltd., Mantra City, Ranipur Range, Haridwar, Uttrakhand-249403.
